title: questions
text:
What are next steps for Duke tuition payment?





Since I’m done with all clinical rotations, can I take CCM boards prior to PULM?





Is staying guaranteed? If no, when would I find that out?





Staying: If I stay, do I need the list of “no negative issues” are every location I’ve ever rotated at?
Would a letter from my med school + residency program + fellowship suffice?

if not and this had to be individual, this list would include over a DOZEN hospital sites
